name: NSFontCollectionMatchingOptionKey
desc: These constants are used by the matchingDescriptors(options:) and matchingDescriptors(forFamily:options:) options dictionary parameters.

items.name: static let includeDisabledFontsOption: NSFontCollectionMatchingOptionKey
items.desc: An NSNumber object containing a Boolean value specifying whether disabled fonts should be included in the list of matching descriptors; true if they should be included, false otherwise. When unspecified, CoreText assumes false. This option is intended only for font management applications. This option will make descriptor matching slower.

items.name: static let removeDuplicatesOption: NSFontCollectionMatchingOptionKey
items.desc: An NSNumber object containing a Boolean value controlling whether more than one copy of a font with the same PostScript name should be included in the list of matching descriptors.

items.name: static let disallowAutoActivationOption: NSFontCollectionMatchingOptionKey
items.desc: An NSNumber object containing a Boolean value specifying that auto-activation should not be used to find missing fonts.
